message: Don't wait for people to be friendly. Show them how.
title: Thought of the day

author: Chinese proverb
message: A gem cannot be polished without friction, nor a man perfected without trials.
title: Thought of the day

author: George Matthew Adams
message: Each day can be one of triumph if you keep up your interests.
title: Thought of the day

author: Robert M. Pirsig
message: The place to improve the world is first in one's own heart and head and hands.
title: Thought of the day
